mapper.sql: university.id as id, university.areaid as areaid, province.name as province, university.name as name, enrolling.year as year, enrolling.batch as batch, enrolling.university_major_type as universityMajorType, enrolling.plan_enrolling_number as planEnrollingNumber, enrolling.real_enrolling_number as realEnrollingNumber, enrolling.length_of_schooling as engthOfSchooling, enrolling.school_fee as schoolFee, enrolling.highest_score as highestScore, enrolling.highest_precedence as highestPrecedence, enrolling.lowest_score as lowestScore, enrolling.lowest_precedence as lowestPrecedence, enrolling.average_score as averageScore, enrolling.average_precedence as averagePrecedence, batchdict.name as batchname, typedict.name as typename
